ygData.subject: Re: [Re: [RE: [eqbards] Need assistance please  ]    ]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The vendor right next to the Kelethin bank sells Pumice stones.  He tends to be one of those vendors who will not give you the best price regardless of
ygData.messageBody:
On 13 Apr 2000, Lisa wrote:
> "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...> wrote:
>
> > Stop by the local magic shop and buy some egg shaped pumice stones. Save
> > one for breaking root and use the other for de-spelling his buffs on him
>
> I hope this isn't a stupid question but since I've had no need up until
> now....where would the local magic shop be in the GF/BB area?
>
> Melodii

The vendor right next to the Kelethin bank sells Pumice
stones. He tends to be one of those vendors who will not give
you the best price regardless of faction or charisma though.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
